author: kfogel
msg: Turns out "echo -n" was not portable (Solaris, for example).
Fortunately, Autoconf offers @ECHO_C@, @ECHO_N@ and @ECHO_T@.  Use the
Autoconf way for Makefile.in, and do it by hand it in gnu-diff.sh,
which is not generated by Autoconf.
* Makefile.in: Use @ECHO_C@ and @ECHO_N@ supplied by autoconf to have
* ac-helpers/gnu-diff.sh: Determine how to have echo not print a
newline, and then use that method.

author: cmpilato
msg: Rearranged some macros that depend on each other to be in a more
intuitive order.  Also, changed SVN_VER_TAG to "rc2".

author: sussman
msg: A beautiful test-case for bug discovered by Vladmir Prus <ghost@cs.msu.csu>.
I've rewritten his original code to use the API with better coverage.
currently commented out, because it fails.  Will reactivate it when
